item.title: Working with stacked branches in git (Part 1)
item.description: In this post I describe why I like to use stacked branches and stacked PRs for larger features, and how I handle making changes to commits in the stack Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-with-stacked-branches-in-git-part-1/
